text: tatha haanke jaayenge, jo kaafir ho gaye narak kee or, jhund banaakar. yahaantak ki jab ve usake paas aayenge, to khol diye jaayenge usake dvaar tatha unase kahenge usake rakshak (farishteh) kya nahin aaye tumhaare paas rasool tumamen se, jo tumhen sunaate, tumhaare paalanahaar kee aayaten tatha sachet karate tumhen, is din ka saamana karane se? ve kahengeh kyon nahin? parantu, sidhd ho gaya yaatana ka shabd, kaafiron par
